segments.text: I observe the kitchen scene carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on her plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is overflowing steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's running down the cabinets and pooling on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get soaked if she doesn't notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching high for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're clearly trying to steal some treats without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the boy's climb perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is neat and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, the mess from the water is just gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool holds; a fall would be awful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This disobedience bothers me a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR
